artist: Painter: After Diego Rodriguez Velazquez formerly attributed to; Painter: After Justus Sustermans; Etcher: H. F. Rose; Publisher: John Young; Publisher: John Murray

Signature, Date and Inscription

below image in black:Etched by H.F. Rose / VELASQUEZ / London, March 20, 1823. Published by J. Young, 65 Upper Charlotte Street, Fitzroy Square / and by / John Murray, Albemarle Street | on sheet in pencil: 2-526
title: Sunday Morning, The Toilet
